meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a bird.
meanings.sent1: The colorful feathers made the costume look very birdy.
meanings.sent2: The wings of the airplane had a birdy shape.
meanings.sent3: The birdy hat made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was light and birdy, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The birdy decorations in the garden attracted many visitors.

meanings.sent1: I saw a cute birdy hopping on the branch.
meanings.sent2: The birdy chirped happily in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The little birdy stole a crumb from my sandwich!
meanings.sent4: She felt free as a birdy flying in the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The birdy built a cozy nest in the tree outside my window.
